tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WarehouseLayout (
    warehouse_id INT,
    warehouse_name VARCHAR(255),
    shelf_id INT,
    shelf_location VARCHAR(255),
    product_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (warehouse_id, shelf_id, product_id)
)

CREATE TABLE goods_movement ( 
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    aisle_id INT NOT NULL, 
    quantity INT NOT NULL, 
    FOREIGN KEY (aisle_id) REFERENCES warehouse_layout(aisle_id) 
);}

CREATE TABLE movement_history (
    movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    from_location_id INT NOT NULL,
    to_location_id INT NOT NULL,
    movement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE warehouse_layout (
  warehouse_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  warehouse_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  total_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE aisle (
  aisle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  warehouse_id INT NOT NULL,
  aisle_number INT NOT NULL,
  aisle_length INT,
  aisle_width INT
)

CREATE TABLE shelf (
  shelf_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  aisle_id INT NOT NULL,
  shelf_number INT NOT NULL,
  shelf_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE product (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  product_weight INT,
  product_dimensions VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE movement_history (
  movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  warehouse_id INT NOT NULL,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  aisle_id INT NOT NULL,
  shelf_id INT NOT NULL,
  movement_date DATE
)
